item.description:
Secrets of the Super Successful
Image and Presentation Skills of Highly Successful Women

Attend this seminar and have a great time developing your style and presentation skills with Style Consultant, Kim Long and Presentation Skills Coach, Jacki Rose. You will learn simple techniques to get others to perceive you as the expert that you are.

Discover what it takes to...

advance in your career
increase your selling potential
boost your confidence
gain more credibility
be a more effective presenter
appear more polished

$25 per person
Register online http://www.jackirose....
in advance for only $20 and receive a complimentary CD "11 Steps to Powerful Public Speaking"

Tuesday, October 6
7:30 am - 9:30 am
Continental Breakfast

Or

Thursday, October 8
6:30 pm - 8:30 pm
Light Refreshments
item.name: 5 Steps to Super Success for Professional Women
